title: Florida's COVID Warning with Surgeon General Dr. Joseph Ladapo
itunes:title: Florida's COVID Warning with Surgeon General Dr. Joseph Ladapo
description:
Charlie starts out by sitting down with Jack Posobiec, TPUSA host of Human Events Daily, for an update on Joe Biden's quid pro quo with Saudi Arabia that everyone seems to have forgotten about, what's happening with Steve Bannon's legal targeting, and how China's President Xi Jinping has set out an authoritarian and ambitious vision for a third and indefinite term as leader of the CCP. Next up, Charlie welcomes Dr. Joseph Ladapo, Surgeon General of Florida, for an in-depth discussion on how his leadership has transformed the national debate on COVID. The author of the new book, "Transcend Fear: A Blueprint for Mindful Leadership in Public Health," Dr. Ladapo explains his new finding that is setting the media on fire, that there is an 84% increase of cardiac DEATH related to the COVID vaccine for men ages 18-39. 

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Charlie starts out by sitting down with Jack Posobiec, TPUSA host of Human Events Daily, for an update on Joe Biden's quid pro quo with Saudi Arabia that everyone seems to have forgotten about, what's happening with Steve Bannon's legal targeting, and how China's President Xi Jinping has set out an authoritarian and ambitious vision for a third and indefinite term as leader of the CCP. Next up, Charlie welcomes Dr. Joseph Ladapo, Surgeon General of Florida, for an in-depth discussion on how his leadership has transformed the national debate on COVID. The author of the new book, "Transcend Fear: A Blueprint for Mindful Leadership in Public Health," Dr. Ladapo explains his new finding that is setting the media on fire, that there is an 84% increase of cardiac DEATH related to the COVID vaccine for men ages 18-39.
